item.title: State moves Solano County into red tier (Tier 2) on COVID-19 framework; allows businesses to reopen some additional indoor activities with modifications

STA expands popular Medical Trip Concierge program, enhancing transportation options for older and disabled adults thanks to funding allocated by County Board of Supervisors from Coronavirus-related CARES Act funds

Solano County Board approves a $2 million Coronavirus related small business grant program with funds to support small businesses and employers impacted by COVID-19 with CARES Act funding; applications via Workforce Development Board and Small Business De
Solano County Environmental Health begins Phase 1 disaster debris removal on properties affected by LNU Lightning Complex fire at no cost to property owners
Solano County ROV informs public of voting options and ballot safety measures for upcoming General Election

Solano County Board approves a Coronavirus related Rental Assistance Program with cash-assistance to qualifying low-income households impacted by COVID-19 with CARES Act funding; applications via Catholic Charities opens September 21

State issues blueprint for a safer economy using color-coded tables; permits shopping centers, retail, hair salons and barbershops with modifications and restrictions to open immediately in Solano County
